originalText.text: Dr.Tepper has been instrumental in my journey thru the “ graceful aging” process. I saw him for my breast augmentation 15 years ago and have been a faithful client since.  Everything Dr. Tepper does is natural,  the recovery is always seamless and he’s always available for all questions.

originalText.text:
I fell on my face in excess of 30 years ago which resulted in medical challenges that became apparent in 2015.  Thankfully, a trusted surgeon referred me to Dr. Tepper, and I couldn’t be more happy with the outcome!  He patiently reviewed the muscular structure+adipose areas with me, a plan was presented/agreed upon, and then we moved forward to execution of!

The goal was achieved in one visit of outpatient surgery, and the follow up was spectacular by his team of APRNs!!!

5 stars, simply put!

originalText.text:
I recently had the unfortunate experience of being bitten on the face by a dog, leading me to seek the expertise of Dr. Tepper. From the moment I contacted his office, the staff was extremely friendly and exhibited a true understanding of the urgency of my situation.
Dr. Tepper's ability to put me at ease was immediate. He took the time to thoroughly explain the procedure, outlining what I should expect and addressing any concerns I had. His professionalism and empathy were evident, providing me with much-needed reassurance during a challenging time.
The procedure itself involved a skin graft on my nose.  His approach demonstrated his commitment to achieving the best possible outcome.
What sets Dr. Tepper apart is not only his surgical skill but also his dedication to personalized care. The decision to choose him was based on a recommendation from someone who had experienced his exceptional service, and I am profoundly grateful for that recommendation. It's worth noting that I had consulted with other surgeons prior to finding Dr. Tepper, and their proposed methods would have resulted in permanent discoloration on my nose.
In conclusion, I highly recommend Dr. Tepper for his expertise, compassionate approach, and commitment to achieving outstanding results.

originalText.text: From consultation to recovery, I cannot speak highly enough of Dr. Tepper and the Greenwich Street Aesthetics staff for my experience.  Being a nurse of 42 years and having had a failed prior face and neck lift 11years ago, I had fears of recurrence and disappointment.  My closest friend had extraordinary results that made me rethink and evaluate my needs. I desired to look natural, not overdone, restore the excessive aging that made me feel much older than my age. Dr. Tepper’s treatment plan, along with his empathic and sensitive nature and experience, left me with no doubts to go forward with surgery.  Dr. Tepper has many gifts, he is an extraordinary human being, an extraordinary surgeon and I am a very grateful patient with a happy smile.

originalText.text: I really want to thank Dr.Oren Tepper for doing all of my facial surgeries, and for being extremely accommodating to me. Everything he did was successful, Dr. Tepper gave me confidence and i felt I could trust him. It was worth the wait! I also want to thank his whole team for the communication and attention they provided me, I was recently at his new practice and it looks so beautiful, wish you all success and prosperity thank you very very much!
